title: 12 hour charity stream for Nepal! Ft. the OPL boys
body:
Hey guys, I'm doing a 12 hour charity stream to raise money for Nepal, starting in 30 minutes. We've got games, RP, and a bunch of other stuff to give away! Also, some of the OPL players including (but not limited to) Chief Swiffer, LCG Joo, LCG Tallywhacka, iM Zenk intel, and ABS Mattress are going to be there, and the person who donates the most will win a 1 hour coaching session with one of them!

So what are you waiting for? Head down to [the stream](http://twitch.tv/qquinn) and come check it out. Oh and remember - No Sejuani

Thanks,
QUlNN

replies.body:
>charity stream

>and the person who donates the most will win a 1 hour coaching session with one of them!

I believe you mean charity auction.
